Reviews.Title: Good Phone for a low amount
Reviews.Author: Reece Wilson
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone after I broke my Samsung Galaxy II while hiking. I didn't want to spend another 600.00 for a phone so I researched on the internet for a good android phone on a lower budget and that's how I ended up with the LG L7. Its a 2012 version but the phone is extra slim--touch screen--current apps available with LG features. The phone runs on a 2G/3G network but if you have a 4G plan it will still work. I am not for sure if the phone switches between 2/3/4 but you have to remember this phone is not a 2013 4G version so it may run slow at times. The phone is unlocked and all I had to do was insert my SIM card and it automatically registered with my T-Mobile network + it shipped in the appropriate new box with all it's wrappings and cords. If you want a nice slim android phone that has current features and low cost this phone would be for you. Please remember its not an I-phone nor a Galaxy Note but can be compared to the Galaxy S model

Reviews.Title: Very good phone, No Spanish language
Reviews.Author: CARLOS PAUL GONZALEZ INDA
Reviews.Content: Phone is very good. It has an excellent performance, and the over-all size and screen size is just right.Just be aware that it seems that this product is destinated for Asian markets, so the system language are English and a lot of Asian languages. But this is not a big problem if you use an android app as MoreLocale2.El telefono es muy bueno, tiene un desempeño excelente, y tiene el tamaño correcto de pantalla y cuerpo del telefono.Ten en cuenta que parece que este producto esta dirigido a los mercados asiaticos, asi que los idiomas del sistema son ingles y muchos idiomas asiaticos. Pero no es un gran problema si se usa una aplicación como MoreLocale 2 o similar.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Sabreen Simmons
Reviews.Content: I had this phone for a month and it works great. I would recommend you purchase your phone from this company. I saved $400. I researched the internet for several weeks before buying the phone. Make sure you read reviews about any company you plan on buying a product from.

Reviews.Title: My best phone.
Reviews.Author: chicabuzo
Reviews.Content: best phone, excellent price,im so really happy with my LG L7 in white color, absolutely recomend, thank you very much

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: MIGUEL EDUARDO
Reviews.Content: buy the cell phone for my wife and she loved how thin the phone, so far to run to perfection, has a good value for money

Reviews.Title: Bad investment
Reviews.Author: L. Swartz "swartz scope"
Reviews.Content: This phone is programmed for the UK. I live in the US. It was not explained or clear in the sales information. Bought this phone and it only half works so I'm using a cracked screen phone since I wasted almost $200 on a phone that doesn't work for me. I won't purchase another cell phone on-line again. What a rip off. I would be happy to sell it to you for half or less than what I paid for it $179. It's worthless to me.

Reviews.Title: nice smartphone
Reviews.Author: Janice399 "JM"
Reviews.Content: The LG optimus p705 I bought from hasslefree was set up for China. Once I figured out how to change it to English the phone was better then I expected. The phone works on T-Mobile and has as many features as on more expensive phones.

Reviews.Title: Pleased
Reviews.Author: Diego Roman Hazard
Reviews.Content: Good phone for the price. Not top of the line, but very accessible. Remember you are not buying an S3, after all, it is low-mid range android phone. If you don't have enough money I recommend buying this one. Not much more to say.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Customer
Reviews.Content: I love how clean the phone looks and the OS is awesome to work with. I recommend it to anyone, the phone was delivered in a very timely matter.

Reviews.Title: It's Ok
Reviews.Author: Maryann Pham
Reviews.Content: Mine was shipped from China. The phone was made by cheap materials. It looks cheap. The ear piece does not fit the phone. The seller did not have any extra one to replace mine. I have AT&T;, therefore the reception is great. I do not use much Apps. The phone has been working fine.

Reviews.Title: Good phone
Reviews.Author: CBC
Reviews.Content: I like the phone very much.  However I don't like the back cover it's really cheap plastic. You would think a quality phone such as this would upgrade to a better quality for the casing.
